department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: This requirement is for the supply, delivery and installation of prefabricated phone booths.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) - Phone Booths
### Notice Information
* **RFSO/2019**: RFSO EP119-230042-B
* **Amendment**: 10
* **Publication Date**: December 23, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: February 22, 2023, 14:00:00 EST (now expired)
* **Government Tender ID**: 14970635
* **Supplier Interface**: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14970635?extsite=MTQ5NzA2MzVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14970635?extsite=MTQ5NzA2MzVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Tender Description (English)
This Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) seeks a contractor to supply, deliver and install prefabricated private phone booths. The contract period will be for up to two years from the issuance of the standing offer, with an option for a one-year extension.

The contractor(s) must be registered on the General Stream of Suppliers (GSS) under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), among other international trade agreements. A security requirement is also associated with this contract.

### Tender Description (French)
Le présent document de soumission est un appel à offre sur pied (AOSP) afin de recruter des entreprises pour la fourniture, la livraison et l'installation de cabines téléphoniques préfabriquées, au besoin et sur demande entre le printemps 2023 et l'automne 2024.

### Contract Information
* **Contract Price**: Approximately [Confidential]$
* **Contract Lead Time**: Approximately [Confidential]
* **Region**: Canada
* **Contract Areas**: Canada
